H0.text: In which country was Saddam Hussein President 1979-2003, being deposed and then hanged in 2006. Egypt

H1.text: In which country was Saddam Hussein President 1979-2003, being deposed and then hanged in 2006. Syria

H2.text: In which country was Saddam Hussein President 1979-2003, being deposed and then hanged in 2006. Jordan

H3.text: In which country was Saddam Hussein President 1979-2003, being deposed and then hanged in 2006. Irāq

A4.text: Saddam Hussein ... served as the president of Iraq from 1979 until he was overthrown in 2003 during the United States–led invasion of Iraq.

A5.text: Saddam was executed by hanging on the first day of Eid ul-Adha, 30 December 2006.
